post.description: Generates a One-Time Password (OTP) for user authentication. The 'codeSource' can either be 'FP' for 'Forget Password' or 'EMAIL' for 'User SignUp'.
Authenticate user with username and password
Update the user's password with the current otp verification
Verify your email address using the provided OTP. In CodeForm, pass either FP (Forget Password) or EMAIL (User SignUp)
